Custom Components

Lecture 06

Custom Components

axios interceptors

You can actually intercept requests before they are made!


axios.interceptors.request.use(
  // successful request
  function (config) {
    // Do something with the request config
    return config;
  },
  // errored request
  function (err) {
    // recover from the error?
    return Promise.reject(err);
  }
);
axios.interceptors.response.use(
  // successful response
  function (response) {
    // manipulate your response before
    // sending it to the store
    return response;
  },
  // errored response
  function (err) {
    // attempt to recover from the error
    return Promise.reject(err);
  }
);

NProgress

Website

API

  • start() : start the progress bar
  • done() : show the progress completed
